meanings.definition: A specialized cell transmitting nerve impulses.
meanings.sent1: Neurons in the brain help us think and remember.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study neurons to understand how the nervous system works.
meanings.sent3: The neurons in the body had a race to see who could send a message the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The neurons in the network of the brain are like messengers delivering urgent packages.
meanings.sent5: The neurons fired like lightning bolts, carrying important information throughout the body.

meanings.sent1: She learned about neurons in science class.
meanings.sent2: The neurons in the spinal cord help control movement.
meanings.sent3: The neurons at the party were the life of the cell.
meanings.sent4: His ideas traveled through his mind like neurons firing in a chain reaction.
meanings.sent5: The neurons communicated with each other like a symphony, creating harmony in the body.
